info.title: Celestia Node API
info.description: The Celestia Node API is the collection of RPC methods that can be used to interact with the services provided by Celestia Data Availability Nodes.

externalDocs.description: Celestia Node GitHub

methods.name: blob.Get
methods.summary: Get retrieves the blob by commitment under the given namespace and height.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: blob.GetAll
methods.summary: GetAll returns all blobs under the given namespaces and height.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: blob.GetProof
methods.summary: GetProof retrieves proofs in the given namespaces at the given height by commitment.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: blob.Included
methods.summary:
Included checks whether a blob's given commitment(Merkle subtree root) is included at
given height and under the namespace.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: blob.Submit
methods.summary:
Submit sends Blobs and reports the height in which they were included.
Allows sending multiple Blobs atomically synchronously.
Uses default wallet registered on the Node.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: daser.SamplingStats
methods.summary: SamplingStats returns the current statistics over the DA sampling process.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: daser.WaitCatchUp
methods.summary: WaitCatchUp blocks until DASer finishes catching up to the network head.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: fraud.Get
methods.summary: Get fetches fraud proofs from the disk by its type.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: fraud.Subscribe
methods.summary: Subscribe allows to subscribe on a Proof pub sub topic by its type.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.GetByHash
methods.summary: GetByHash returns the header of the given hash from the node's header store.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.GetByHeight
methods.summary:
GetByHeight returns the ExtendedHeader at the given height if it is
currently available.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.GetVerifiedRangeByHeight
methods.summary:
GetVerifiedRangeByHeight returns the given range [from:to) of ExtendedHeaders
from the node's header store and verifies that the returned headers are
adjacent to each other.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.LocalHead
methods.summary: LocalHead returns the ExtendedHeader of the chain head.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.NetworkHead
methods.summary: NetworkHead provides the Syncer's view of the current network head.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.Subscribe
methods.summary: Subscribe to recent ExtendedHeaders from the network.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.SyncState
methods.summary: SyncState returns the current state of the header Syncer.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.SyncWait
methods.summary: SyncWait blocks until the header Syncer is synced to network head.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: header.WaitForHeight
methods.summary:
WaitForHeight blocks until the header at the given height has been processed
by the store or context deadline is exceeded.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: node.AuthNew
methods.summary: AuthNew signs and returns a new token with the given permissions.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: node.AuthVerify
methods.summary: AuthVerify returns the permissions assigned to the given token.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: node.Info
methods.summary: Info returns administrative information about the node.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: node.LogLevelSet
methods.summary: LogLevelSet sets the given component log level to the given level.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.BandwidthForPeer
methods.summary:
BandwidthForPeer returns a Stats struct with bandwidth metrics associated with the given peer.ID.
The metrics returned include all traffic sent / received for the peer, regardless of protocol.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.BandwidthForProtocol
methods.summary:
BandwidthForProtocol returns a Stats struct with bandwidth metrics associated with the given
protocol.ID.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.BandwidthStats
methods.summary:
BandwidthStats returns a Stats struct with bandwidth metrics for all
data sent/received by the local peer, regardless of protocol or remote
peer IDs.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.BlockPeer
methods.summary: BlockPeer adds a peer to the set of blocked peers.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.ClosePeer
methods.summary: ClosePeer closes the connection to a given peer.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.Connect
methods.summary:
Connect ensures there is a connection between this host and the peer with
given peer.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.Connectedness
methods.summary: Connectedness returns a state signaling connection capabilities.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.Info
methods.summary: Info returns address information about the host.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.IsProtected
methods.summary: IsProtected returns whether the given peer is protected.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.ListBlockedPeers
methods.summary: ListBlockedPeers returns a list of blocked peers.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.NATStatus
methods.summary: NATStatus returns the current NAT status.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.PeerInfo
methods.summary:
PeerInfo returns a small slice of information Peerstore has on the
given peer.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.Peers
methods.summary: Peers returns connected peers.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.Protect
methods.summary:
Protect adds a peer to the list of peers who have a bidirectional
peering agreement that they are protected from being trimmed, dropped
or negatively scored.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.PubSubPeers
methods.summary:
PubSubPeers returns the peer IDs of the peers joined on
the given topic.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.ResourceState
methods.summary: ResourceState returns the state of the resource manager.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.UnblockPeer
methods.summary: UnblockPeer removes a peer from the set of blocked peers.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: p2p.Unprotect
methods.summary:
Unprotect removes a peer from the list of peers who have a bidirectional
peering agreement that they are protected from being trimmed, dropped
or negatively scored, returning a bool representing whether the given
peer is protected or not.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: share.GetEDS
methods.summary: GetEDS gets the full EDS identified by the given root.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: share.GetShare
methods.summary: GetShare gets a Share by coordinates in EDS.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: share.GetSharesByNamespace
methods.summary:
GetSharesByNamespace gets all shares from an EDS within the given namespace.
Shares are returned in a row-by-row order if the namespace spans multiple rows.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: share.ProbabilityOfAvailability
methods.summary:
ProbabilityOfAvailability calculates the probability of the data square
being available based on the number of samples collected.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: share.SharesAvailable
methods.summary:
SharesAvailable subjectively validates if Shares committed to the given Root are available on
the Network.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.AccountAddress
methods.summary: AccountAddress retrieves the address of the node's account/signer

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.Balance
methods.summary:
Balance retrieves the Celestia coin balance for the node's account/signer
and verifies it against the corresponding block's AppHash.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.BalanceForAddress
methods.summary:
BalanceForAddress retrieves the Celestia coin balance for the given address and verifies
the returned balance against the corresponding block's AppHash.

NOTE: the balance returned is the balance reported by the block right before
the node's current head (head-1). This is due to the fact that for block N, the block's
`AppHash` is the result of applying the previous block's transaction list.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.BeginRedelegate
methods.summary: BeginRedelegate sends a user's delegated tokens to a new validator for redelegation.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.CancelUnbondingDelegation
methods.summary: CancelUnbondingDelegation cancels a user's pending undelegation from a validator.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.Delegate
methods.summary: Delegate sends a user's liquid tokens to a validator for delegation.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.IsStopped
methods.summary: IsStopped checks if the Module's context has been stopped

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.QueryDelegation
methods.summary: QueryDelegation retrieves the delegation information between a delegator and a validator.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.QueryRedelegations
methods.summary: QueryRedelegations retrieves the status of the redelegations between a delegator and a validator.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.QueryUnbonding
methods.summary: QueryUnbonding retrieves the unbonding status between a delegator and a validator.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.SubmitPayForBlob
methods.summary: SubmitPayForBlob builds, signs and submits a PayForBlob transaction.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.SubmitTx
methods.summary:
SubmitTx submits the given transaction/message to the
Celestia network and blocks until the tx is included in
a block.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.Transfer
methods.summary:
Transfer sends the given amount of coins from default wallet of the node to the given account
address.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.

methods.name: state.Undelegate
methods.summary: Undelegate undelegates a user's delegated tokens, unbonding them from the current validator.

externalDocs.description: Source of the default service's implementation of this method.
